user_query: I'm a music lover and I want to explore different genres and artists. Can you suggest some popular songs and artists from various genres using the Billboard 200 chart and the Greatest of All Time Artists chart? Additionally, provide me with a playlist of these songs using the Spotify API.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current Billboard 200 chart to get popular songs across different genres.
Fetch the Greatest of All Time Artists chart to identify influential artists in various genres.
Combine the results from Billboard 200 and Greatest of All Time Artists to create a list of suggested songs and artists.
Create a playlist on Spotify using the suggested songs identified in the previous steps.
